body: There is a translation here, I saw it a few days ago.  I just visited for the comments.. was wondering what Chinese speakers talked about. :| Much disappoint.   Anyway we are all gonna be worm food whether or not we ask for a translation.  Its not like the people who run the site are beholden to read the comments.  All they want to do is make a quick buck off of the video game advertisements.   I wonder who actually clicks on that?  Conversion rates?
I LOVE THIS YEASSSS!!!!!!!!!!!! please do not ask translation cuz you will die, it was written on comment box before lol
I would love to be a shota in Nora Higuma's world.
